verb.description: Give an account in words of (someone or something), including all the relevant characteristics, qualities, or events.
examples: the man was described as tall, clean-shaven, and with short dark hair

verb.description: Mark out or draw (a geometric figure)
examples: on the diameter of a circle an equilateral triangle is described

origin: Late Middle English: from Latin describere, from de- down + scribere write.
